text: Andi Mack is an American family comedy-drama television series created by Terri Minsky. It premiered on Disney Channel on April 7, 2017, and ended on July 26, 2019. The series stars Peyton Elizabeth Lee, Joshua Rush, Sofia Wylie, Asher Angel, Lilan Bowden, Lauren Tom, and Trent Garrett. It follows 13-year-old Andi Mack and her best friends, Cyrus Goodman and Buffy Driscoll, as they attend middle school. title: Andi Mack
